timeline.bodyText:
Could you please provide more information in the name about what it is supposed to do?

The given, when, then form is good to store this information
timeline.author: balhar-jakub

timeline.bodyText: Add an example of how the version information looks like.
timeline.author: balhar-jakub
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -28,3 +28,10 @@ It is also printed to the log as the very first messsage:
     [GS] 16:32:04.098 [main] INFO org.zowe.apiml.product.service.BuildInfo - Service gateway-service version xyz #n/a on 2018-08-23T14:28:33.231Z by plape03mac850 commit 6fd7c53
     [DC] 16:32:04.195 [main] INFO org.zowe.apiml.product.service.BuildInfo - Service discoverable-client version xyz #n/a on 2018-08-23T14:28:33.217Z by plape03mac850 commit 6fd7c53
     [AC] 16:32:04.317 [main] INFO org.zowe.apiml.product.service.BuildInfo - Service api-catalog-services version xyz #n/a on 2018-08-23T14:28:33.201Z by plape03mac850 commit 6fd7c53
+
+
+## Version Information

timeline.bodyText: Would it be possible to move at least the internal logic to the separate private method to make this method more easily understood?
timeline.author: balhar-jakub

replies.bodyText: Sure! Even into two private methods!
replies.author: arxioly

timeline.bodyText: This was not changed by you but we have typo here
timeline.author: jandadav

timeline.bodyText:
Calling the endpoint for version as documented is timing out and throwing zuul exceptions on gw
implies URL https://localhost:10010/api/v1/gateway/version
Please help me if i'm interpreting the information on the apidoc incorrectly
timeline.author: jandadav

timeline.message:
version endpoint replaced to api/v1/gateway

Signed-off-by: Elena Kubantseva <elena.kubantseva@broadcom.com>

fixed routing problem

Signed-off-by: Elena Kubantseva <elena.kubantseva@broadcom.com>

timeline.bodyText: Integration test is failing. requestString should be updated to contain also either /gateway or /api/v1/gateway I guess.
timeline.author: taban03

replies.bodyText: Good point! Thanks for catched it!
